content.prompt: The structure shown can be attributed to

choices.label: Frank Gehry because of its curvilinear metallic shell
Maya Lin because of its interactive involvement with the spectator
Robert Venturi because of its playful interpretation of historical antecedents
Zaha Hadid because of its deconstructed geometric form

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
